joi.alternatives.all: {{#label}} does not match all of the required types
joi.alternatives.any: {{#label}} does not match any of the allowed types
joi.alternatives.match: {{#label}} does not match any of the allowed types
joi.alternatives.one: {{#label}} matches more than one allowed type
joi.any.default: {{#label}} threw an error when running default method
joi.any.failover: {{#label}} threw an error when running failover method
joi.array.hasKnown: {{#label}} does not contain at least one required match for type {:#patternLabel}
joi.array.hasUnknown: {{#label}} does not contain at least one required match
joi.array.includes: {{#label}} does not match any of the allowed types
joi.array.includesRequiredBoth: {{#label}} does not contain {{#knownMisses}} and {{#unknownMisses}} other required value(s)
joi.array.max: {{#label}} must contain less than or equal to {{#limit}} items
joi.array.sort: {{#label}} must be sorted in {#order} order by {{#by}}
joi.array.sort.mismatching: {{#label}} cannot be sorted due to mismatching types
joi.array.sort.unsupported: {{#label}} cannot be sorted due to unsupported type {#type}
joi.array.sparse: {{#label}} must not be a sparse array item
joi.binary.base: {{#label}} must be a buffer or a string
joi.binary.max: {{#label}} must be less than or equal to {{#limit}} bytes
joi.date.max: {{#label}} must be less than or equal to {{:#limit}}
joi.date.min: {{#label}} must be greater than or equal to {{:#limit}}
joi.function.maxArity: {{#label}} must have an arity lesser or equal to {{#n}}
joi.function.minArity: {{#label}} must have an arity greater or equal to {{#n}}
joi.object.assert: {{#label}} is invalid because {if(#subject.key, `"` + #subject.key + `" failed to ` + (#message || "pass the assertion test"), #message || "the assertion failed")}
joi.object.max: {{#label}} must have less than or equal to {{#limit}} key{if(#limit == 1, "", "s")}
joi.object.missing: {{#label}} must contain at least one of {{#peersWithLabels}}
joi.object.oxor: {{#label}} contains a conflict between optional exclusive peers {{#peersWithLabels}}
joi.object.pattern.match: {{#label}} keys failed to match pattern requirements
joi.object.rename.multiple: {{#label}} cannot rename {{:#from}} because multiple renames are disabled and another key was already renamed to {{:#to}}
joi.object.rename.override: {{#label}} cannot rename {{:#from}} because override is disabled and target {{:#to}} exists
joi.object.schema: {{#label}} must be a Joi schema of {{#type}} type
joi.object.xor: {{#label}} contains a conflict between exclusive peers {{#peersWithLabels}}
joi.number.max: {{#label}} must be less than or equal to {{#limit}}
joi.number.min: {{#label}} must be greater than or equal to {{#limit}}
joi.number.precision: {{#label}} must have no more than {{#limit}} decimal places
joi.string.base64: {{#label}} must be a valid base64 string
joi.string.dataUri: {{#label}} must be a valid dataUri string
joi.string.domain: {{#label}} must contain a valid domain name
joi.string.empty: {{#label}} is not allowed to be empty
joi.string.hexAlign: {{#label}} hex decoded representation must be byte aligned
joi.string.ip: {{#label}} must be a valid ip address with a {{#cidr}} CIDR
joi.string.ipVersion: {{#label}} must be a valid ip address of one of the following versions {{#version}} with a {{#cidr}} CIDR
joi.string.isoDuration: {{#label}} must be a valid ISO 8601 duration
joi.string.max: {{#label}} length must be less than or equal to {{#limit}} characters long
joi.string.min: {{#label}} length must be at least {{#limit}} characters long
joi.string.normalize: {{#label}} must be unicode normalized in the {{#form}} form
joi.string.token: {{#label}} must only contain alpha-numeric and underscore characters
joi.string.pattern.base: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} fails to match the required pattern: {{#regex}}
joi.string.pattern.name: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} fails to match the {{#name}} pattern
joi.string.pattern.invert.base: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} matches the inverted pattern: {{#regex}}
joi.string.pattern.invert.name: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} matches the inverted {{#name}} pattern
joi.string.trim: {{#label}} must not have leading or trailing whitespace
joi.string.uriCustomScheme: {{#label}} must be a valid uri with a scheme matching the {{#scheme}} pattern
joi.string.uriRelativeOnly: {{#label}} must be a valid relative uri
